page.title: 04M.S.& E.M.Patrick
page.content: Mr & Mrs Patrick run 2 businesses from Marlbrook Farm.(1)a{dairy herd of 47 {Friesian cows}plus a few Jersey & Guernseys.They use a 4 year old docile Hereford bull to produce 83 beef store cattle.(2){Agricultural Contractor. From Cadburys factory,non toxic waste such as stale milk,contaminated chocolate or liquid sugars are taken in special tractor and tanker units to{50 farms}where the liquid is spread over fields to provide fertilizer.Now 7 tractor & trailer units, 2 tanker lorries and 2 tanker direct injection units can supply{20,000 gallons per {day}if required to any farm within a 60 mile radius. Mr Patrick{employs 11 {people.}This includes tractor drivers, lorry drivers,a special mechanic,a dairy operative, a stockman.The office work is done by Mrs Patrick.Their tractors &trailers are seen every day
